notes: thumbnail_url and preview_gif_url are blank — upload media assets separately
profile_picture_url in testimonials are blank — upload separately
bts_images arrays are blank — upload separately
bunny_video_id in project_videos is blank — wire up after Bunny CDN upload
featured and full_width default to false — set manually per project
placeholder is false for all real projects
cast members are included in credits with role 'Cast'

projects.title: Tilt 5
projects.subtitle: A "Gaming Together" Rallying Cry
projects.description: The gaming industry has isolated players. Tilt 5 challenges this with augmented reality gaming that brings people together. This campaign rallies gamers around a novel approach, leveraging the founder's authentic story and precise casting.

testimonial.quote: This is how you build a cool brand, folks.

projects.title: Tidbyt • Gen 2 Launch
projects.subtitle: A Vignette-Heavy Meta Video Essay
projects.description: A modular video essay with interconnected vignettes for Tidbyt's Kickstarter Gen 2 launch. Behind-the-scenes moments of team members providing feedback on the launch video itself, combining product showcase with meta-commentary. Vignettes designed for flexible repurposing as social media assets.

testimonial.quote: Yup.

projects.title: Lumen
projects.subtitle: Brand Refresh Campaign
projects.description: A 2-day shoot threading three unique use cases into a brand anthem video with match action cross-cutting, social edits, and lifestyle photography featuring three generations.

testimonial.quote: One of the most talented and creative teams I've ever met.

projects.title: Daybreak
projects.subtitle: A Board Game Quick-start Guide
projects.description: A cooperative board game quickstart video featuring gameplay documentation with teleprompter hosting and documentary-style cinematography. The production showcases the game's approachable nature through real players and dynamic camera work.

testimonial.quote: Looks INCREDIBLE!!!! Wow, just amazing amazing work.

projects.title: Breadwinner
projects.subtitle: Hi-Fi Tasty Bread-Tech for Backerkit
projects.description: Crowdfunding campaign video featuring silky slow motion, macro close-ups, and sourdough starter timelapse to showcase how easy baking better bread can be.

testimonial.quote: Thoughtfully crafted our story into something entertaining, smart, honest, and important for our brand's future.

projects.title: Wild Clean
projects.subtitle: Sustainable Cleaning Brand Video
projects.description: Flagship branding video plus social ad cutdowns for a sustainable cleaning product launch in the US. The production featured creative direction from Wild Clean's team and showcased their eco-friendly solution.

testimonial.quote: 12/10 Happy.

projects.title: TaloBrush
projects.subtitle: Crowdfunding Launch with a Splash
projects.description: A crowdfunding launch video featuring five talent sharing a bathroom in a comedic studio setting. Vibrant production design, dynamic lighting solutions for a challenging two-story bathroom space, and polished motion graphics.

testimonial.quote: The execution from planning and storyboards to shooting and post was amazing, and we're really happy with the end product!

projects.title: Tilt 5 • Catan x Tilt 5 Trailer
projects.subtitle: Video Game Trailer
projects.description: A web commercial teaser blending drone footage from Mendocino County with jib shots from an Oakland loft and VFX to showcase the immersive holographic experience of Tilt Five's augmented reality board game adaptation.

testimonial.quote: Nothing short of a miracle. This thing is a masterpiece and worth every penny.

projects.title: Erie
projects.subtitle: Sparkling Jewelry Campaign
projects.description: A jewelry campaign featuring macro photography and match-action cuts. The narrative follows a diamond ring's sparkle and a secret passed through multiple settings—flower shop, yoga studio, brunch venue, and more—showcasing Erie jewelry's versatility.

testimonial.quote: No boring, generic stuff here. Exceeded our expectations and asked the right questions to understand our brand & objectives.

projects.title: Nine Arches
projects.subtitle: An Epic Poetic and Quite Aesthetic
projects.description: A shoestring epic shot by a skeleton crew featuring absurd scenes supported by verses in an epic poem. Includes a flock of chickens cycling down city streets, captured by camera crew rigged to a Ratchet Rickshaw.

testimonial.quote: No creative team works harder than these guys to make soulful, magical and impactful pieces. It is unfair how talented they are.

projects.title: Keyboard.io • Model 100 Launch
projects.subtitle: A Brand Story Video Essay
projects.description: Brand story via video essay for crowdfunding campaign. Features motion control cinematography with macro lens showcasing keyboard design details, blending brand narrative with product storytelling. Campaign exceeded $1M in crowdfunding.

testimonial.quote: I've backed 351 Kickstarter projects, and that video is easily in the top five.

projects.title: Otherlab • Lightfoot Teaser
projects.subtitle: A scamper through the city on rolling sunshine
projects.description: Proof-of-concept video featuring an electric scooter with solar panels. Two cameras rigged to a pedicab captured lifestyle footage of riders enjoying the vehicle through urban environments with natural lighting highlighting the scooter's distinctive design.

testimonial.quote: This is fabulous. Perfect day of shooting.

projects.title: Seismic
projects.subtitle: Proof of Concept + Brand Reveal
projects.description: Brand reveal video centered on a thematic match-action edit featuring a photographer moving from seated to standing, discovering inspiration while wearing powered clothing. The fog becomes a character element in the production. Supported a $22M fundraising round.

testimonial.quote: They strike a productive balance of project management and impactful creative.

projects.title: Crave
projects.subtitle: "BTS" x Fashion Shoot Crowdfunding Launch
projects.description: Fashion photoshoot staged as a behind-the-scenes peek at the Vesper 2 crowdfunding video. Features an intimate interview and slow-motion fashion footage showcasing the elevated brand aesthetic of pleasure jewelry.

testimonial.quote: True to their name, they really are friends and allies — fun to work with and they get shit done.

projects.title: Tidbyt
projects.subtitle: 80's Commercial Jingle
projects.description: An 80s-inspired commercial jingle featuring a cappella pitch moment transformed into a professional production with original music, colorful visuals, costume changes, and a 4x3 frame reminiscent of after-school cartoons.

testimonial.quote: Incredible. I get giddy when I watch it. I'm really impressed. Stunning.

projects.title: Lumos
projects.subtitle: in the Apple Store
projects.description: Feature announcement video for Lumos helmet that secured placement in Apple Stores worldwide. Production involved a calculated timelapse strategy capturing sunset transition into nighttime, culminating in a cyclist with illuminated helmet riding into frame.

testimonial.quote: 11/10 happy.

projects.title: Joué Play
projects.subtitle: Docu-Style Launch
projects.description: A documentary-style launch video featuring Arabian Prince and musicians experiencing the Joué Play instrument for the first time, showcasing authentic reactions and performances.

testimonial.quote: They did an amazing job helping us get the best video possible for our crowdfunding campaign.

projects.title: Etcher Laser
projects.subtitle: A Hosted Laser Cave for Crowdfunding
projects.description: Industrial product launch featuring a hero video showcasing a laser etcher. Circular dolly shots with specialty lighting debut the brand new equipment through cascading warehouse window illumination and spotlight effects.

testimonial.quote: We're not sure a call is needed… we have no feedback!

projects.title: Tilt 5
projects.subtitle: First Crowdfunding Launch
projects.description: Hero video production for Kickstarter's highest-performing A.R. project, featuring 3D hologram demonstration with custom VFX, circular dolly work, and original fantasy-synth score. Raised $1.8 million.

testimonial.quote: They went above and beyond to help us write, refine, and produce our promo video.

projects.title: Light Pong
projects.subtitle: World's First 1D Console on Crowdfunding
projects.description: A crowdfunding video for the Light Pong One Dimensional Game Console, styled as a nostalgic 90s commercial with dramatic lighting and narration.

testimonial.quote: WHOO HOO – FRIENDS AND ALLIES THE KICKSTARTER VID LEGENDS. I love it!

projects.title: IDEM • Manufacturing Tools
projects.subtitle: Onboarding Campaign for Manufacturing Tools
projects.description: Ten-video onboarding campaign bridging machine shop analog with forward-looking IoT technology, featuring Hollywood-level lighting in a Modesto facility with a charismatic machinist talent.

testimonial.quote: Great work! They came out really well and I can't wait to get them out in use!

projects.title: Dabby
projects.subtitle: Hosted Live Demo
projects.description: A hosted launch event featuring a live demo of Dabby's voice search technology. The production involved creative set design with movable walls to create an authentic room setting for demonstrating the product's reliable voice search functionality.

testimonial.quote: I highly recommend them. A valuable asset for any company that works with them.

projects.title: Lumos
projects.subtitle: Street + Matrix Launch
projects.description: Launch video for new Matrix and Electric Avenue helmets capturing speed, freedom, and joy of cycling. Production involved special vehicle rigging mounted to a Vespa scooter with remote operator, overnight shooting to showcase illuminated helmets.

testimonial.quote: 11/10 happy.

projects.title: Negative
projects.subtitle: A Climate Solution on Your Wrist
projects.description: Three comedic vignettes highlighting the unknowing impact of daily actions, featuring red balloons throughout, with a hopeful climate message from founder Tito Jankowski.

testimonial.quote: These guys blew us away with their commitment to the cause and their ability to deliver on an incredible vision.

projects.title: C.H.I.P.
projects.subtitle: A $9 Computer Launch for Kickstarter
projects.description: A Kickstarter launch video for a $9 computer featuring two long takes totaling seventy seconds. Helped introduce CHIP to global audiences via news outlets worldwide. Raised over $2 million on Kickstarter.

testimonial.quote: The Godfather of Kickstarter videos.

projects.title: Lumen
projects.subtitle: A Healthy First Crowdfunding Launch
projects.description: Crowdfunding launch campaign that raised $2.4 million on IndieGoGo. Hero video hosted by talent that embodied the product benefits and brand values, emphasizing the 'Human' element prominently featured in Lumen's brand guidelines.

testimonial.quote: One of the most talented and creative teams I've ever met.

projects.title: Crave
projects.subtitle: Kinky Cuffs Launch
projects.description: Voyeuristic video featuring women expressing private pleasures in public settings. Combined studio product shots with founder addressing viewers, elevating the pleasure product space.

testimonial.quote: True to their name, they really are friends and allies — fun to work with and they get shit done.
